item.title: JiuZhang3.0: Efficiently Improving Mathematical Reasoning by Training Small Data Synthesis Models
item.description: JiuZhang3.0 efficiently enhances LLMs’ mathematical reasoning by training a small model to synthesize high-quality training data, drastically reducing costs.
